property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets 'Multiple: 1.' Not playable on an attack that is a Multiple copy. R Commit: Before you discard momentum to pay a cost, reduce the amount of momentum you need to discard for the cost by 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent attempts to play a block against your attack, that block's difficulty gets +X. X equals the number of attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your {Good} attack this turn gets -2 difficulty. All of your attacks get +2 damage for each card you discarded as a result of your opponent's card effects this turn.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum. Discard 1 card from your card pool. The next attack you play this turn gets +1 damage. Only playable if you have dealt 3 or more damage to your opponent this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play a second copy of a card you have already played this turn, play a third copy of that card from your hand following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you discard momentum to pay the cost of a card or ability, take 1 of the cards discarded this way and add it to the top of your deck. E Commit: If your attack is not blocked, your next attack this turn gets +1 damage and -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if All the cards in your card pool share the {Good} symbol.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Take the top 2 cards of your deck and add them to your momentum. E Discard 3 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card blocks an attack with Multiple, All of that card's Multiple copies are discarded. E: If this attack deals damage, the next {Good} attack you play this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card blocks an attack with Multiple, All of that card's Multiple copies are discarded. E Discard 1 momentum: Discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card blocks an attack with Multiple, All of that card's Multiple copies are discarded. E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: Your opponent discards X of their momentum. For every momentum that your opponent cannot discard for this ability, this attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum. Only playable if you have less momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, the next {Good} attack you play this turn gets -3 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you discard a card from your card pool, take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum. Not playable during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: Before you play a {Good} card, that card gets -X difficulty. X equals your hand size or your opponent's hand sizse (your choice) minus the number of cards in your hand. R: After you commit or destroy 1 or more foundations due to your opponent's card effect, if you have no foundations ready, ready All of your foundations. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you discard 1 or more cards due to your opponent's card effect, your opponent loses X vitality. X equals the number of cards discarded. E Commit: Your {Good} attack gets +2 damage.Maxi E: Your {Good} attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your hand. Maxi E Commit: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After you play an attack's Stun ability, that attack gets +2 damage. E Commit: Any attack gets 'Stun: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: When you could play an ability printed on one of your foundations as if it were ready, play it as though it were printed on this card. E Destroy 1 committed foundation: Your attack gets +1 speed and +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of committed cards in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 ready foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent may not play form abilities on cards in their staging area. E: If this attack deals damage, you may discard 1 momentum to have it remain in your card pool at the end of your turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit X foundations: Choose X cards in your opponent's staging area. Your opponent may not play abilities on those cards for the rest of this turn. This attack gets -X damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays an ability printed on 1 of their assets, destroy the asset and negate its effects. Nightmare R Commit: After your opponent plays a form ability printed on a card in their staging area, negate its effects. The negated ability may not be played for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your card pool face down. E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage for each face down card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, lose X vitality: Discard X cards from your card pool. X may not be greater than the number of cards in your card pool. R Commit, lose X vitality: Before your opponent makes a control check for a block, that check gets -X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose X vitality: During the Block Step, this attack is completely blocked and deals no damage. X equals the attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose X vitality: This attack gets 'Multiple: X'. X may not be greater than half of your vitality (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn is successful (no control check necessary). Only playable if you have lost more vitality this turn than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's next control check this turn gets -X. X equals the amount of damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, the control check for that block gets -X. X equals the number of attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, lose X vitality. Your next attack this turn gets -X difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose 2 vitality: After you play a card and resolve its effects, discard it from your card pool. Only playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your opponent attempts to block this attack, the control check for that block gets -X. X equals the number of cards played as blocks in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: This attack may be blocked by any card with a block on it. If the block is successful, it is completely blocked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: When you fail the control check to play a card, you may commit cards in your momentum as well as foundations to make your check successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you fail the control check to play a card, you may discard any number of momentum. Each card discarded this way counts as committing a foundation to make your check successful. F Commit, discard 1 momentum, discard 1 card: Add 3 cards from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play an attack, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. F Discard 2 momentum: Add 2 cards from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Add 1 card from your momentum to your hand. If the momentum discarded to pay this card's cost was an attack you may add that attack to your hand as well.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack, take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your momentum. E Commit 2 momentum, discard 1 card: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. Only playable if you have 3 or more momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other card in your card pool. E Discard any number of non-attack cards: If this attack deals damage, for each card discarded for this ability either add a card from your momentum to your hand or add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum. X equals the amount of damage this attack dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked with an attack card, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn when you commit or discard momentum to make a control check successful, each card committed or discarded counts as 2 foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 momentum, discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, add 1 card from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up)E Discard 1 momentum, discard 1 card: Add 3 cards from your momentum to your hand. This attack will no longer deal half damage if completely blocked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 non-attack card, discard 2 momentum: Add 2 cards from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card, discard 1 momentum: Add 1 card from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you fail the control check to play an attack, you may discard 1 momentum. When committing foundations to make the control check successful, the momentum you discarded this way counts as 1 committed foundation. Yun-Seong R: After you add the top card of your deck to your momentum, take 1 of your momentum cards and place it on the top of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card, discard 1 momentum: Add 2 cards from your momentum to your hand. R Commit: After you discard cards due to your opponent's card effect, add an equal number of cards from your removed from game pile to your hand.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard a non-attack card: Add 1 card from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you fail the control check to play an attack, you may commit 1 momentum. When committing foundations to make the control check successful, the momentum you committed this way counts as 1 committed foundation. Yun-Seong R Commit: After you commit 1 or more cards in your momentum, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy a foundation: Add the top 3 cards of your deck to your momentum. Playable while committed. Either player may play this ability once per Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 damage for each attack in your card pool before it. F Commit: Ready 1 of your foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent completely blocks 1 of your attacks, commit this card. R: After you play a {Death} and {Fire} card, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you discard this card due to your opponent's card effect, your opponent discards their hand or All of the cards in their card pool (your choice). R: After you play an attack that has a higher speed than damage, that attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you discard this card due to your opponent's card effect, your opponent loses vitality equal to their hand size. R: After your opponent plays a {Chaos} or {Evil} card, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you discard this card due to your opponent' s card effect, commit X cards in your opponent's staging area. X equals your opponent's hand size. R: After you partially block an attack, that attack deals no damage and you draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your weapon attack gets +2 damage. F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Ready 1 foundation that you have not readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Ready 1 of your foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 1 card. Ready 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage. You may not play this attack's Multiple ability. Only playable if you have not played the Multiple ability of this attack. E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: For the rest of this turn, after you ready a foundation, take the top card of your deck and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent doesn't block this attack, it gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 {Fire} card: Take 1 {Air} attack in your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card. Only playable if there is another {All} card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you discard this card due to an opponent's card effect, place this foundation in your staging area ready instead. F Commit: Draw 1 card and then discard 1 card. Only playable if you have readied a foundation during your Combat Phase this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before the block step of your opponent's attack if you have no cards in your hand, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card to your hand and remove the other 2 revealed cards from the game. Playable while committed. R Commit: After you partially block an attack, during your next turn the first attack you play gets +2 damage.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, immediately place it in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you completely block this attack, draw 1 card. R: After your opponent plays a card or ability and if you have no cards in your hand, draw cards up to your opponent's hand size. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Fire} attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if the immediately preceding attack in your card pool dealt damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your opponent's block modifiers get +1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you commit a foundation to successfully play a card, ready 1 foundation

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your weapon attack gets +1 damage. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and replace them in any Order. R: After your opponent destroys one of your foundations, take a foundation from your discard pile and add it to your staging area ready.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card discarded this way to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets 'Stun: 2.' E Commit, discard 2 momentum: Your attack with difficulty 5 or more gets +5 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After this attack is completely blocked, destroy 1 weapon asset in your opponent's staging area and your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent may discard 1 low attack card. If they do not, remove 1 card in your opponent's discard pile from the game and your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent loses X vitality. X cannot be greater than half the damage of this attack rounded down. Only playable if this attack's damage is higher than its printed damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: During your opponent's next turn, their first attack gets -2 damage. Only playable if the preceding card in your card pool is a low attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Your opponent may not play enhance abilities for the rest of this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent commits foundations as a result of this attack's Stun ability, commit your opponent's character card. Only playable if this attack's Stun ability has not been played.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack with Multiple is blocked, All of its Multiple copies are discarded. E Commit: If your opponent's character shares 2 or more resource symbols with your character, All attacks get +1 difficulty for the rest of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit X foundations: Take X cards from your discard pile and add them to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit your character card: Before you play an {Evil} card, that card gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play a card, if it has the same difficulty as the 2 cards preceding it in your card pool, you either draw 1 card or your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Take any 3 cards from your discard pile and add them to the bottom of your deck in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage. Only playable if your opponent played an attack that was not blocked last turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a weapon asset is destroyed, discard any number of cards, then draw an equal number of cards. R: After one of your E or R abilities is negated or canceled, commit any 1 card in your opponent's staging area. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove this card from the game: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals double your attack's printed difficulty. Only playable if you have an action, asset, and foundation card in your card pool.
